description: SINGAPORE - Singapore Athletics has been dealt another blow just three months after the sport's governing body was criticised by the authorities for infighting, with management committee (MC) members Poh Seng Song and Gary Yeo throwing in their resignation letters. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Former national sprinters Poh and Yeo resign from S'pore Athletics' management committee
title_page: Former national sprinters Poh and Yeo resign from S'pore Athletics' management committee | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - Singapore Athletics has been dealt another blow just three months after the sport's governing body was criticised by the authorities for infighting, with management committee (MC) members Poh Seng Song and Gary Yeo throwing in their resignation letters.
Poh, who is the SA's vice-president (finance & partnerships), and athletes' commission representative Yeo - who had been recommended by Poh - had stepped down last Wednesday (March 18), said the association's spokesman.
